name: Abyss Crossing (suzurin_bell)
description:
◆ Expected Play Time
Around 10 hours
◆ Genre
Front View Battle RPG
◆ Explore System
3D Map Exploration
◆ Multiple Storylines
The story’s perspective changes depending on the chosen protagonist
◆ Production Period
Approximately 1 year
◆ Game Info
・ Will take 5-8 hours to beat the game for the first time
・ 3D Map Exploration
・ Multiple Scenarios
◆Attention Points/Most Effort Points
・ Creating varying story perspectives for each protagonist
・ Script and character writing
・  Creating hardcore omnibus scenarios
・ Taking everything into account to set up unique world views
◆Message to all players
This is an RPG game meant to be played at one’s leisure.
While this game includes points from previous works,
it was also made to be enjoyed by newcomers to the series.
Please rate this game if you like, as it will encourage me to create new works.
